# Skills

These skills are reusable tasks for agents.

## add-api-endpoint
- Add an endpoint in apps/api/Codec.Api
- Include validation and tests if applicable
- Update docs/ARCHITECTURE.md and docs/FEATURES.md

## add-svelte-route
- Add a route in apps/web/src/routes
- Connect to the API via PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL
- Update docs/FEATURES.md

## add-ef-migration
- Update EF Core models and add a migration
- Ensure SeedData stays in sync
- Note migration steps in docs/DATA.md when needed

## add-auth-guard
- Add or update auth checks in the API and web
- Update docs/AUTH.md

## add-api-client
- Add or update a typed API client in apps/web
- Handle auth headers and error states

## update-seed-data
- Update apps/api/Codec.Api/Data/SeedData.cs
- Verify migrations align with model changes

## update-docs
- Update PLAN.md status
- Update relevant docs in /docs

## verify-changes
- Run local builds or describe how to run them

## Vendored skills (awesome-copilot)
- webapp-testing
- web-design-reviewer
- refactor
- git-commit
- github-issues
- nuget-manager
- gh-cli
- azure-deployment-preflight
